meanings.sent1: The table was overed with a bright red tablecloth.
meanings.sent2: The car was overed with a thick layer of dust.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked funny with its tail overed in tape.
meanings.sent4: The garden was overed in a blanket of fresh snow.
meanings.sent5: The sky was overed with dark storm clouds, signaling rain.

meanings.sent1: The overed bridge led to the other side of the river.
meanings.sent2: The overed boundary marked the end of the property.
meanings.sent3: The overed line on the map confused the hikers.
meanings.sent4: The overed horizon seemed to stretch endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The overed mountain peak was a challenge for climbers.

meanings.definition: Defeated or overwhelmed by someone or something
meanings.sent1: The overed team accepted their loss graciously.
meanings.sent2: The overed wrestler congratulated his opponent.
meanings.sent3: The overed army retreated after the battle.
meanings.sent4: The overed candidate conceded the election.
meanings.sent5: The overed student sought help to improve their grades.
